tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE security_incidents (
  incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_date DATE,
  incident_type VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT,
  severity INT
);

CREATE TABLE SecurityIncidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    incident_type VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    reported_by VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE BreachDetails (
    breach_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT REFERENCES SecurityIncidents(incident_id),
    breach_date DATE,
    breach_type VARCHAR(50),
    breach_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE security_incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    incident_description TEXT,
    severity_level VARCHAR(10),
    affected_system VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE breach_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    log_details TEXT,
    breach_type VARCHAR(20),
    user_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE investigation_notes (
    note_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    note_text TEXT,
    investigator_name VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES security_incidents(incident_id)
);

CREATE TABLE security_incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_type VARCHAR(100),
    incident_date DATE,
    description TEXT,
    severity INT
);

CREATE TABLE security_breaches (
    breach_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    breach_type VARCHAR(100),
    breach_date DATE,
    description TEXT,
    severity INT
);
